branchCategory.name: 10/21-VQ1*0*, Base Mounted Plug-in Valves, Clean Series
branchCategory.description: <P>10-VQ valves are ideal for applications requiring high speed, frequent operation, stable response time and long service life. Innovative mounting methods allow valves to be changed without entirely disassembling the manifold. Built-in one-touch fittings save piping time and labor. </P>

breadCrumb.name: 10/21-VQ1*0*, Base Mounted Plug-in Valves, Clean Series
